item.title: Leaves blocking road markings Simms Rd, 15th November
item.description:
Dear Team The leaves in Simms Road SE1 have been swept into the gutter and are blocking road markings. This is making parking difficult as there are piles of leaves taking up spaces. This will also cause blocked drains. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Simms Road, Bermondsey, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothes and boxes spread over the pavement, 15th November
item.description:
This section of Allerton Road is a repeat fly tipping area. This has been here for 3 days and the numbers of items is growing daily

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Park, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed vehicle dumped on public road, 15th November
item.description:
As depicted this car is untaxed and has been dumped in the same spot for many many months. Itâ€™s clearly abandoned and this road has been notorious for being used by people/garages for storing abandoned cars. Please investigate. Photos taken 15th November 2025 but the car has been here for most of the year, if not since 2024.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wrottesley Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Doors, sofa bed, lamp, somewhat the entirety of a living room, 15th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lassell Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Autumn leaves uncleared, 15th November
item.description:
The length of Walden Road, which has many trees and should therefore be a priority for Bromley Council, autumn leaves uncleared since October now mulching and causing a slip hazard. Extremely dangerous, especially for the elderly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Refuse sack placed next to litter bin, 15th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, Bromley, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet
